title: Ethereum 101
description: The Ethereum blockchain protocol, the EVM and what differentiates it with other blockchains.

multipleChoiceQuestions.title: What major improvement differentiated Ethereum from its predecessors (such as Bitcoin) during launch?
answers: It provided a Turing complete scripting language that allowed to execute code called smart contracts
It provided a more sustainable, energy-efficient consensus algorithm
It had less than 21M circulating supply of its base currency
It provides anonymity and private transactions

multipleChoiceQuestions.title: Who's the inventor of the Ethereum protocol?
What is the base transaction fee for sending a standard Ether transaction?
answers: It depends how much Ether you send

multipleChoiceQuestions.title: How long does it take to finalize a block?
